content.p: The University of Nottingham's research equipment is listed on the Kit-Catalogue database and is available for all staff and students to view. As a member of the MI group of universities our equipment is also listed, alongside that of Aston, Birmingham, Leicester, Loughborough and Warwick on the MI website. For University of Nottingham staff only, further equipment information can be found on Equipment Workspace. The national equipment database includes listings from more than 25 institutions, including Nottingham, and can be found at equipment.data.ac.uk. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
